value:
Fancy a bite o' seafood? Leave it
to me! I got more than enough fish
to go around.

I'm mighty grateful to Prince Marth.
He's saved these old bones more
times than I can count!

By the barnacled blade o' Shanty
Pete, this be the cleanest castle
I ever saw! Who swabs the place?

Rowdiness is one thing, but wasting
food I can't abide. You best eat your
fill and then some!

There ye have it, a nice haul of grub
for the festival... Well? These fish
aren't gonna eat themselves!

Ahoy! The name's Darros! I'm here
to spread word of a festival over at
$Nf's.$k$pBeing a pirate festival, it was only
natural they invite a man o' the sea
such as meself!

Don't much care for bloodshed,
but I be happy to help the crew.
Raise sail!

That leaves a briny taste
in me mouth.
That's mighty kind of ya!

I be Darros, a simple man o' the sea.
My pirating days are behind me, but
just this once... Aye, I'll join in!

I used to lead a fisherman's life, living
off what I could catch...till one day
I was boarded by pirates.$k$pThought I'd have to fight 'em, but
they mistook me for one of their own,
so I ended up joining the crew.$k$pMostly I worked below deck, doing
odd jobs, but I feel guilty about those
days all the same...$k$pAnyhow, thanks to Prince Marth, I left
the life of a sea dog behind, and now
I'm back on an even keel.$k$pThis festival's more than enough
pirating for me, hehe!$k$pAnd if I run into any pirates who want
out o' the plundering life, I'll be sure
to help 'em change course!
はあっ
これで…
ぐあっ…
当然だ…
Forgive me.
It's all I know!
For my prince!
I'll earn my keep!
So this be the end...
Hehe...
Ahoy, I be Darros, a simple man o' the sea.
Avast! I haven't the patience for this...
I need to start over. Earn myself an honest living.
I committed a good deal of grave sins in my pirating days...
The life of a pirate isn't something to be proud of, but a festival could be fun...
I owe everything to Prince Marth. He was never one to cast me off.
After the fight is over, why don't we cast off on my ship? I'll set out some tasty food for ya.
You're at the helm.
Weigh anchor?
Leave it to me.
